data.author: Michael Earls

changelog.release_notes: Added support for French, German, and Spanish. Translations from English by Google Translate. Improved communication with phone to fix a bug where the app would sometimes crash after the watch had been idle.
App now uses location to determine which hemisphere you are in. It then displays the correct perspective of the moon depending on Northern or Southern hemisphere.
Updated moon images to be more realistic.
Reworked the app to run without bluetooth connection.
Fixed a bug with First Quarter not showing phase text

data.description:
Now supports English, Français, Deutsch, and Español

A simple app that displays the current phase of the moon. It uses your location to determine if you are in the Northern or Southern hemisphere and displays the correct perspective of the moon.

Français

Une application simple qui affiche la phase actuelle de la lune. Il utilise votre emplacement afin de déterminer si vous êtes dans l'hémisphère Nord ou Sud et affiche la bonne perspective de la lune. Traduction de l'anglais par Google translate.

Deutsch

Eine einfache Anwendung, die aktuelle Mondphase anzeigt. Es nutzt Ihren Standort zu bestimmen, ob Sie in der nördlichen oder südlichen Hemisphäre sind und zeigt die richtige Perspektive des Mondes. Übersetzung aus dem Englischen von Google Translate.

Español

Una aplicación sencilla que muestra la fase actual de la luna. Utiliza su ubicación para determinar si se encuentra en el hemisferio norte o el sur y muestra la perspectiva correcta de la luna. La traducción del Inglés por Google Translate.

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for French, German, and Spanish. Translations from English by Google Translate. Improved communication with phone to fix a bug where the app would sometimes crash after the watch had been idle.

data.title: cerkit.com Moon Phase
